review: Product is okay but not as good as I expected.
Build quality feels cheap and a bit fragile.
Battery drains quicker than advertised.
Performance is average and lags occasionally.
Design is decent but lacks premium feel.
Some features don’t work as smoothly as claimed.

Customer service response was slow.
Instructions manual was unclear and confusing.
Feels overpriced for the features offered.

Buttons feel stiff and not very responsive.
Wi-Fi connection drops sometimes.
Some apps crash unexpectedly on this.
Not very user-friendly for beginners.
